Package ru.tinkoff.qa.neptune.core.api.steps.conditions

Class ToGetConditionalHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • ru.tinkoff.qa.neptune.core.api.steps.conditions.ToGetConditionalHelper
  • public final class ToGetConditionalHelper
extends Object
    This is the util which helps to crate function with given conditions.

    • Method Detail

      • getSingle

        public static <T,​R> Function<T,​R> getSingle​(Function<T,​R> function,
                                                        Predicate<? super R> condition,
                                                        @Nullable
                                                        Duration waitingTime,
                                                        @Nullable
                                                        Duration sleepingTime,
                                                        @Nullable
                                                        Supplier<? extends RuntimeException> exceptionSupplier,
                                                        Collection<Class<? extends Throwable>> toIgnore)
        This method returns a function. The result function returns a single value which suits criteria.
        Type Parameters:
        T - is a type of input value
        R - is a type of the target value
        Parameters:
        function - function which should return some object
        condition - predicate which is used to find some target value
        waitingTime - is a duration of the waiting for valuable result
        sleepingTime - is a duration of the sleeping between attempts to get expected valuable result
        toIgnore - classes of exception to be ignored during execution
        exceptionSupplier - is a supplier which returns the exception to be thrown on the waiting time expiration
        Returns:
        a function. The result function returns a single value. It returns a value if it suits criteria. Some exception is thrown if value is null or doesn't suit criteria.

      • getList

        public static <T,​R,​V extends Iterable<R>> Function<T,​List<R>> getList​(Function<T,​V> function,
                                                                                        Predicate<? super R> condition,
                                                                                        ResultSelection<List<R>,​List<R>> resultSelection,
                                                                                        @Nullable
                                                                                        Duration waitingTime,
                                                                                        @Nullable
                                                                                        Duration sleepingTime,
                                                                                        @Nullable
                                                                                        Supplier<? extends RuntimeException> exceptionSupplier,
                                                                                        Collection<Class<? extends Throwable>> toIgnore)
        This method returns a function. The result function returns immutable List of elements which differ from null and suit the criteria.
        Type Parameters:
        T - is a type of input value
        R - is a type of target values
        V - is a type of Iterable of R
        Parameters:
        function - function which should return Iterable
        condition - predicate which is used to find some target value
        resultSelection - rule to return the result
        waitingTime - is a duration of the waiting for valuable result
        sleepingTime - is a duration of the sleeping between attempts to get expected valuable result
        exceptionSupplier - is a supplier which returns the exception to be thrown on the waiting time expiration
        toIgnore - classes of exception to be ignored during execution
        Returns:
        a function. The result function returns immutable List of elements which differ from null and suit the criteria. It returns not empty iterable when there are such elements. Some exception is thrown if result iterable is null or has no elements which suit the criteria.

      • getArray

        public static <T,​R> Function<T,​R[]> getArray​(Function<T,​R[]> function,
                                                         Predicate<? super R> condition,
                                                         ResultSelection<R[],​R[]> resultSelection,
                                                         Duration waitingTime,
                                                         Duration sleepingTime,
                                                         Supplier<? extends RuntimeException> exceptionSupplier,
                                                         Collection<Class<? extends Throwable>> toIgnore)
        This method returns a function. The result function returns an array of elements which differ from null and suit the criteria.
        Type Parameters:
        T - is a type of input value
        R - is a type of target values
        Parameters:
        function - function which should return an array
        condition - predicate which is used to find some target value
        resultSelection - rule to return the result
        waitingTime - is a duration of the waiting for valuable result
        sleepingTime - is a duration of the sleeping between attempts to get expected valuable result
        exceptionSupplier - is a supplier which returns the exception to be thrown on the waiting time expiration
        toIgnore - classes of exception to be ignored during execution
        Returns:
        a function. The result function returns an array of elements which differ from null and suit the criteria. It returns not empty array when there are such elements. Some exception is thrown if result array is null or has no elements which suit the criteria.

      • getFromIterable

        public static <T,​R,​V extends Iterable<R>> Function<T,​R> getFromIterable​(Function<T,​V> function,
                                                                                          Predicate<? super R> condition,
                                                                                          ResultSelection<Iterable<R>,​R> resultSelection,
                                                                                          @Nullable
                                                                                          Duration waitingTime,
                                                                                          @Nullable
                                                                                          Duration sleepingTime,
                                                                                          @Nullable
                                                                                          Supplier<? extends RuntimeException> exceptionSupplier,
                                                                                          Collection<Class<? extends Throwable>> toIgnore)
        This method returns a function. The result function returns a single Iterable item that suits criteria.
        Type Parameters:
        T - is a type of input value
        R - is a type of the target value
        V - is a type of Iterable of R
        Parameters:
        function - function which should return Iterable
        condition - predicate which is used to find some target value
        resultSelection - rule to return the result
        waitingTime - is a duration of the waiting for valuable result
        sleepingTime - is a duration of the sleeping between attempts to get expected valuable result
        exceptionSupplier - is a supplier which returns the exception to be thrown on the waiting time expiration
        toIgnore - classes of exception to be ignored during execution
        Returns:
        a function. The result function returns a single first found value from Iterable. It returns a value if something that suits criteria is found. Some exception is thrown if result iterable to get value from is null or has zero-size or it has no item which suits criteria.

      • getFromArray

        public static <T,​R> Function<T,​R> getFromArray​(Function<T,​R[]> function,
                                                           Predicate<? super R> condition,
                                                           ResultSelection<R[],​R> resultSelection,
                                                           Duration waitingTime,
                                                           Duration sleepingTime,
                                                           Supplier<? extends RuntimeException> exceptionSupplier,
                                                           Collection<Class<? extends Throwable>> toIgnore)
        This method returns a function. The result function returns a single array item that suits criteria.
        Type Parameters:
        T - is a type of input value
        R - is a type of the target value
        Parameters:
        function - function which should return an array
        condition - predicate which is used to find some target value
        resultSelection - rule to return the result
        waitingTime - is a duration of the waiting for valuable result
        sleepingTime - is a duration of the sleeping between attempts to get expected valuable result
        exceptionSupplier - is a supplier which returns the exception to be thrown on the waiting time expiration
        toIgnore - classes of exception to be ignored during execution
        Returns:
        a function. The result function returns a single first found value from array. It returns a value if something that suits criteria is found. Some exception is thrown if result array to get value from is null or has zero-length or it has no item which suits criteria.
